name: league
description: The main key of creating this app is to make creating your own tournaments in various contests simply and nicely without pain of calculating results or creating calendars of matches.

scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ..
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: cd backend && eslint src --ext .ts && cd ../frontend && eslint src --ext .ts
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint -- --fix
